alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Floyd; Johnson; Knott; Magoffin; Martin; Pike (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 5:21PM EDT until July 18 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Martin County in northeastern Kentucky... Southern Johnson County in northeastern Kentucky... Northern Knott County in southeastern Kentucky... Floyd County in southeastern Kentucky... Northeastern Breathitt County in southeastern Kentucky... Northwestern Pike County in southeastern Kentucky... Central Magoffin County in southeastern Kentucky... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 520 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Gapville, or 9 miles southeast of Salyersville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Observed. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pikeville, Paintsville, Prestonsburg, Salyersville, Mason, Coal Run Village, Martin, Allen, Oaklawn Estates, Vail, Davella and Lancer. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Breathitt; Floyd; Johnson; Knott; Magoffin; Martin; Pike
